text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    102499006Fit and well
    161901003Chronic sick
    271795006Malaise and fatigue
    248264000No complaints
    386705008Lightheadedness
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 365275006 (General well-being finding (finding))

name: GeneralWellbeing
title: General Wellbeing
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of General well-being finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT
